author: greystroke
content: Is there any consensus on whether some sort of slot shaping eip (eg. Eip 7886 delayed execution or Eip 7732 ePBS) an absolute prerequisite to significantly shortening the slot time? Imho, an initial near-term 50% reduction to 6s would be significant and ideal if can be done safely, perhaps with a long term goal of 4s slots times.
